thread.title: Hyatt slashes 50% off for trade stays in Bangkok, Hua Hin
thread.title_full: Hyatt slashes 50% off for trade stays in Bangkok, Hua Hin

author: Bangkok, September 3, 2015
title: Hyatt slashes 50% off for trade stays in Bangkok, Hua Hin
text:
Hyatt slashes 50% off for trade stays in Bangkok, Hua Hin Bangkok, September 3, 2015 
Credit: Grand Hyatt Erawan Bangkok 

HYATT Hotels and Resorts in Thailand is offering two new deals for travel consultants and travellers alike. 

Travel trade members can enjoy 50 per cent off Hyattâ€™s daily rate at the Grand Hyatt Erawan Bangkok and Hyatt Regency Hua Hin from September 1 to December 20, 2015. Identification and proof of travel industry employment will be required upon check-in to receive the special rates. 

Guests who book a minimum of three nights at the Grand Hyatt Erawan Bangkok, Hyatt Regency Hua Hin or Hyatt Regency Phuket Resort will get one free night. This offer is only available to guests who book from September 18 to December 19, 2015, and stay between October 1 to December 20, 2015. 

More information is available at www.bangkok.grand.hyatt.com .
